#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Mr. Gallos did not respond to numerous questions .
#Text=Instead of emailing Wikinews with his sole answer , as was asked , he posted it directly to Wikinews .
#Text=Erica Maier
#Text=44-year-old Erica Maier is general manager of Kathite Industries , makers of a chimney cleaner ;
#Text=" As Kathite is a seasonal occupation , I am also a full time Letter Carrier for Canada Post , I love the exercise and could certainly use it , and it keeps me in touch with the public . "
#Text=Describe the three most important issues in your campaign .
#Text=Ward 32 is a unique family community within a major city .
#Text=In order to preserve our quality of life , we must be ever vigilant to ensure we are n't overrun by oversized building developments , graffiti , vandals or petty crime .
#Text=My aim is to hire a graffiti removal team that would be available daily .
#Text=Eradicate the graffiti and keep it away .
#Text=Continue to work with police and have police more visible in the area , walking along our streets , parks and school yards .
#Text=Police would get to know our neighbours , business owners and the local children which would return a sense of well being to our inhabitants .
#Text=I encourage taking art to the streets .
#Text=Have billboards in various locations that locals can contribute to monthly .
#Text=Thus promoting our area and the artists of our community .
#Text=We need additional programs for teenagers that get them involved and keep them interested in community development .
#Text=Finally I would continue the work of preserving the heritage of our neighbourhoods , while helping the local businesses get the much needed assistance to grow and develop into thriving commerce
#Text=This could be achieved by having events and venues that add to our uniqueness and increasing consumer traffic and spending .
#Text=What one election issue do you feel is most relevant to your ward in this election ?
#Text=At present I feel graffiti is my biggest concern .
#Text=It is a small issue that has been left to fester and could balloon into all sorts of problems for our area and the city .
#Text=If graffiti is left as a ‘ broken window '
#Text=Why have you chosen to involve yourself in the political process ?
#Text=I am a person who involves myself in my community .
#Text=If things need to be done , I am a volunteer for the job .
#Text=This has always been fine in the past , as we have a terrific area with very few needs .
#Text=Unfortunately , things have changed , although crime is down for Toronto , petty crime is ever increasing .
#Text=Vandals attack cars , spray paint graffiti everywhere , and if left unchecked , it will escalate to major crimes .
#Text=Citizens are concerned and feel the need to stay indoors and not enjoying their neighbourhoods as they have in the past .
#Text=I intend to retire in my neighbourhoods , but it wo n't be a happy retirement if I do n't act now and stop this neglect .
